convertToDefaultUnit

public static java.lang.String convertToDefaultUnit(Context context,
                                                    java.lang.String attrName,
                                                    java.lang.String value,
                                                    java.lang.String uom)
                                             throws FrameworkException
getValue retrives the required data from UOM attribute

Parameters:
context - the eMatrix Context object
attrName - String attributeName
value - value to be converted
uom - unit in which the value is in
Returns:
String converted value in to the default unit
Throws:
FrameworkException - if the operation fails
Since:
AEF BX3
